title: How can I disable Bitcode support?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
•  I am developing a game for iOS platform
  •  I want to set ENABLE_BITCODE=NO in the Xcode project as the default setting for a Xcode project exported by Unity.
  • I have several third party libraries which still do not support Bitcode on iOS.

sections.title: Cause
content: In version 5.3.1p1 Bitcode support was enabled by default.

sections.title: Resolution
content: An easy way to disable Bitcode support is by using UnityEditor.iOS.Xcode.PBXProject helper class.

sections.title: More Information
content: It is not recommend to disable Bitcode, but there are cases were it is inevitable. Read more about what benefits you gain by letting Bitcode enabled here.
This article applies to Unity versions 5.3.1p1 and higher
